lead_paragraph: Most of Britain's Olympic athletes will stay away from Friday's  opening ceremony for the Rio Games at the Maracana Stadium, team officials said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Most British Athletes to Shun Rio Opening Ceremony
headline.main: Most British Athletes to Shun Rio Opening Ceremony

snippet: Most of Britain's Olympic athletes will stay away from Friday's  opening ceremony for the Rio Games at the Maracana Stadium, team officials said on Monday....
